alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry, southeastern Conway and southwestern Faulkner Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 644 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adona, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Perryville... Mayflower... Wooster... Oppelo... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Sequoya Park... Toad Suck... Wye Mountain... Plumerville... Bigelow... Casa... Aplin... Fourche... Antioch in Perry County... Oak Grove in Perry County... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 114 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
